tasks.task_description: Test API endpoints for token validation and user flows
Test Lambda function directly with different user scenarios
Test UI flows with browser automation
Verify quota exceeded handling and tier detection

description: Test FAISS-Marketplace integration flows: API, Lambda, and UI automation testing
context: API testing completed successfully. Fixed DynamoDB reserved keyword issue in marketplace token validator. Anonymous flow works (3 searches), registered user flow works with proper token validation, and quota exceeded scenario properly returns 429 status. Marketplace API correctly increments usage and tracks quotas.

Lambda testing completed successfully. FAISS Lambda now properly increments marketplace usage and handles quota exceeded scenarios correctly. Registered users get proper usage tracking (1,3,5,7,9,10 searches) and quota exceeded returns 429 with upgrade URL while preserving user tier identification.

Lambda testing completed successfully. FAISS Lambda now properly increments marketplace usage and handles quota exceeded scenarios correctly. Registered users get proper usage tracking (1,3,5,7,9,10 searches) and quota exceeded returns 429 with upgrade URL while preserving user tier identification.
Resetting all usage counters and re-testing complete integration flows at API and Lambda levels as documented in MARKETPLACE_FAISS_INTEGRATION_ANALYSIS.md
